_header: Christ that was crucified on the cross for our sins sake
_description: John Audelay, The Hours of the Cross — ten 9-line stanzas

BodDou302.First Lines:
Crist þat was crucifyd on cros for our synnes sakeLord on our
                    mysdede no vengans þou take…
BodDou302.Last Lines:
…To haue grace & merceIn heien fore euer
                    aplace
BodDou302.Attributed Title:
Hic incepiunt hore canonice passionis Ihesu Christe (f.
                        15vb)
BodDou302.Editions:
Whiting,  Ella Keats,
                        ed.  
             John Audelay: The Poems.
EETS
         o.s. 184 (1931); repr. 1988: 101-4.
